extendedInfo.description: Listen to more than 3,000 classic audiobooks totally free.  You can find every classic books in this app. With this app you can listen books wherever and whenever.App Features: - Totally free.- Search books easy. - Listen online. - Listen offline by downloading to phone. - Download books easy. - Background playing.Short list books: Romeo and Juliet, The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes, The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes, The Art of War, War and Peace, The Return of Sherlock Holmes, Treasure Island, Pride and Prejudice, Moby Dick, The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland, Robinson Crusoe, The Adventures of Tom Sawyer, The Swiss Family Robinson, Jane Eyre, Aesopâs Fables, Tarzan of the Apes, Dracula, Emma, Our Island Story, Andersenâs Fairy Tales, Gulliverâs Travels, The 9/11 Commission Report, Oliver Twist, King Solomonâs Mines, Alexander the Great, David Copperfield, A Tale of Two Cities, Frankenstein, Ulysses, The Adventures of Pinocchio, Don Quijote, This Side of Paradise, The Scarlet Pimpernel, Persuasion, The Call of the Wild, Paradise Lost, Shakespeare Monologues, Beyond Good and Evil, The Mystery of the Yellow Room, Anthem, 2 B R 0 2 B, Northanger Abbey, English Fairy Tales, The Pilgrimâs Progress, The Gods of Mars, A Princess of Mars, Anne of the Island, Heidi, Love and Freindship, The Adventures of Reddy Fox, Anne's House of Dreams, The Adventures of Ulysses...Famous authors: Mark Twain, William Shakespeare, Aesop, Leo Tolstoy, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, Thomas Hardy, L. reviews.title: Poor operation, needs work...
reviews.comment: App looks good, but doesn\'t  deliver; most of these books are readily available via the LibriVox apps; app does not keep your place-if you close the session, you have to find the book again, then find your place! I\'ll stick with LibriVox!
reviews.author: Dave Cusick
